title: Herbed and spiced roast beef fillet
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons fresh rosemary leaves', '2 tablespoons fresh thyme leaves', '2 bay leaves', '4 cloves garlic', '1 large shallot, peeled and quartered', '1 tablespoon orange zest', '1 tablespoon coarse salt', '1 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '1/2 teaspoon ground nutmeg', '1/4 teaspoon ground cloves', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '2 whole beef fillets, trimmed']
